bomberman.core.logic
Class Strategy2

java.lang.Object
  bomberman.core.logic.Strategy2
All Implemented Interfaces:
MoveStrategy
public class Strategy2
extends java.lang.Object
implements MoveStrategy

The Strategy2 class is an implementation of the MoveStrategy interface. This strategy lets the DynamicPhysicsEntity move over all the ground (static and dynamic) maintaining the current Direction for a fixed number of blocks (when possible), changing then direction.

Author:
Federico Scozzafava
See Also:
MoveStrategy}, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strategy_pattern
